name: Heaven's Kitchen (dpain)
description:
You’ve just got accepted into Heaven’s Kitchen, the holiest contest in the universe to-be. Your task is to populate a recently created world by crafting different chemical concoctions into new creatures. Follow your chef’s instructions and make your way through chaotic levels as you try your best to create a world in your bosses’ image.

Developed for the 2021 RetroJam organized by UPorto’s IEEE Student Branch.

Controls: In order to play the game you’ll need to create several chemical reactions. Open each faucet with your ‘1’, ‘2’ and ‘3’ keys and fill out the flasks according to the requests appearing on the right side of your screen. To get different liquids into each flask, you’ll need to drag them with your mouse and place them under the faucet with the color you want to fill the task with.
